languages.text: Существо восстанавливает {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g}, равное {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g}, который наносит его {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}атака в ближнем бою{/g}.

traits.locale_text: This creature restores wounds equal to the damage dealt by its melee attack.

languages.text: 每当此生物使用{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，都会恢复同等数量的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。

languages.text: この生物は自身の{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}によって与えた{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}と同等の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}を回復する。

languages.text: Esta criatura recupera tantas {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} como el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} que infligen sus {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Esta criatura recupera tantas {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} como el daño que infligen sus {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}.

languages.text: Diese Kreatur stellt {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} in Höhe des durch ihren {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} verursachten {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schadens{/g} wieder her.

languages.text: Cette créature récupère un nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} égal aux {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligés par son {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g}.

languages.text: Bu yaratık, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısının{/g} verdiği {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} kadar {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanını tazeler.
